long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Surviv.io Wiki page, in a chrome extension! If you grind Surviv.io, you know how useful the Surviv Wiki is, and now you can have it open in a popup window on the side, so no other tabs required, perfect for comparing images and loot!
